column5: Which tribs do you fish? I love fall steelhead ps - if steelhead had spiny backs and swam through Lac Seul, you would have more interest in the thread..lol

You gave me an idea to dress one up for Halloween next year lol. I fish many of tribs in southern Ontario - north shores of Lake Ontario and south shores of Georgian Bay. I won't be too specific with names - but 90pct of the tribs hold decent populations of fish this time of year.
That was a test to see if you were a real steelheader or not - you passed congratulations! I fish the North Shore of Superior. Our fish are not as big as yours, but they are a great sport fish.

Growing up as a shore angler, I think (of course IMO) steelheading is the apex of that journey - starting with a worm bobber and panfish. Lake O fish are huge, but I find the Huron fish are scrappier. I'd love to fish a Superior Steelhead. Maybe when I'm retired and the arthritis isn't so bad - I'll get that motivation or the lotto. Which ever comes first. Lol. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
